Model 6000
with this
Video Processing System
□ Works with 1 /4-inch to 2-inch VTR’s—quad or helical scan—
accommodates large time base errors
□ Sync generator will lock to EIA or industrial sync or operate as master
sync generator
□ 360° burst phase adjustment
□ Provides complete video processing-inserts new sync and blanking,
regenerates old burst or inserts new burst
□ Provides full sync, blanking, and drive pulse outputs locked to input video,
subcarrier output locked to input burst
□ Front panel control of video, chroma, pedestal, and burst phase
□ Compensates for delays of one or more scan lines
□ Competitively priced
Write or call today for complete specifications.
